title: Deskside manner
creator_credit: Hugh Munro, S.B. Modules and Organisation and Methods Training Council
brief_description: An abbrassive efficiency expert interviews a worker about his job. A humorous look at office efficiency, emphasising the need to follow logical steps and avoid duplicating work.
